ConditionPatientIdentifierSearchParameter

Parameter patient.identifier:token

Searches for Condition by the patient identifier eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Condition?patient.identifier={identifier}

ResourceCondition
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesCondition
MultiplesThe parameter cannot repeat or have multiple values

name: ConditionPatientIdentifierSearchParameter
description: Searches for Condition by the patient identifier eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Condition?patient.identifier={identifier}
